title: Semi Detached Building - means a building detached on three sides with marginal distances as specified and on the fourth side attached to a building in an adjoining plot
clause_text: Semi Detached Building - means a building detached on three sides with marginal distances as specified and on the fourth side attached to a building in an adjoining plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
